name: Draw Me Something #LDJam41
description:
Art meets shooter in this game created for the Ludum Jam 41.

Key bindings are completely customizable. Defaults are WASD for shooting,Arrow Keys for movement, and 1-4 and Q/R for weapon color selection.

All art was created in Paint.NET or within the art editor I wrote into this game
Sounds were created by Sfxr
Music generated in Computoser
